title: Richard Rogers - Architecture of the future
content:
The typeface is used for everything in this book I spotted today.  
I go close with many conjectures but I can’t identify it.  
Anyone?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080312104708im_/http:/typophile.com/files/3764370491.02.LZZZZZZZ.jpg)

 [‹ Caslon Italic Font](http://web.archive.org/web/20080312104708/http:/typophile.com/node/17982 "Go to previous forum topic") [Black Sabbath - Master of Reality ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080312104708/http:/typophile.com/node/17978 "Go to next forum topic")
author: rubs

comments.content:
Ah yes! I should have known that...  
Thank you.
